snippet: The federal judge overseeing the case said she would not rule on the N.F.L.’s motion to dismiss until Sept. 3 to give the mediator time to bring the sides closer.
abstract: Federal Judge Anita B Brody delays ruling in NFL concussion case and brings in a mediator to bring sides closer.

byline.contributor: Jon Hurdle contributed reporting from Philadelphia.

lead_paragraph: The federal judge overseeing the case said she would not rule on the N.F.L.’s motion to dismiss until Sept. 3 to give the mediator time to bring the sides closer.

headline.main: Judge Orders N.F.L. Concussion Case to Mediation
headline.print_headline: Judge Delays Ruling in N.F.L. Concussion Case and Brings In Mediator
